required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: PK/PD Clinical Trial of YYD601 in Healthy Adult Male
clinical_study.official_title: A Dose Blocked-randomized, Open-label, Parallel Design Clinical Trial to Assess the Pharmacokinetic/Pharmacodynamic Properties and Safety of YYD601 After Oral Administration in Healthy Adult Male Volunteers(Phase 1)

brief_summary.textblock: A dose block-randomized, open-label, parallel clinical trial

detailed_description.textblock: This study to evaluate comparatively a characteristics and safety of the PK/PD of single/repeated oral administration YYD601 and Nexium tab and the effects of food influence the PK/PD of YYD601 in healthy adult male.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Each arm is assignted 10 persons[the percent of each arm is (treatmnet: comparator=4:1)]

primary_outcome.time_frame: Evaluate the before/after treatment period(5 days per phase)
primary_outcome.description: Blood sampling time: 1d, 5d, 12d, 16d(each 17 times) half-life(after single dose), (after repeated dose)

primary_outcome.time_frame: Evaluate the before/after treatment period(5 days per phase)
primary_outcome.description: Blood sampling time: 1d, 5d, 12d, 16d(each 17 times) Tmax(after singlidose), Tmax.ss(after repeated dose)

primary_outcome.time_frame: Evaluate the before/after treatment period(5 days per phase)
primary_outcome.description: Blood sampling time: 1d, 5d, 12d, 16d(each 17 times) Cmax(after singlidose), Cmax.ss(after repeated dose) Cmin.ss(after single dose),Cmin.ss(after single dose)

primary_outcome.time_frame: Evaluate the before/after treatment period(5 days per phase)
primary_outcome.description: Blood sampling time: 1d, 5d, 12d, 16d(each 17 times) AUClast(after singlidose), AUCt(after repeated dose) AUCinf(after single dose), AUCinf(after repeated dose)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Evaluate the before/after treatment period(5 days per phase)
Evaluate the before/after treatment period(5 days per phase)

other_outcome.measure: Adverse event monitoring check up the vital sign(blood-pressure, pulse rate, temparature)
other_outcome.time_frame: Evaluate the before/after treatment period(5 days per phase)

other_outcome.measure: Adverse event monitoring check up the 12-lead EKG
other_outcome.time_frame: Evaluate the before/after treatment period(5 days per phase)

other_outcome.measure: Adverse event monitoring check up the clinical laboratory test
other_outcome.time_frame: Evaluate the before/after treatment period(5 days per phase)

other_outcome.measure: Adverse event monitoring check up the physical
other_outcome.time_frame: Evaluate the before/after treatment period(5 days per phase)

other_outcome.measure: Adverse event monitoring check up the administraton about the combined drugs
other_outcome.time_frame: Evaluate the before/after treatment period(5 days per phase)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:
- Healthy adult male above 19 years old when getting a screening test.
- Subjects who have over 50kg weight, included in the IBWÂ± 20% range. [IBW(kg)={height(cm)-100}x0.9
- Subjects who haven't any congenital or chronic disease, and any other disease following the medical examination.
- Subjects who are confirmed as a participant by the serum test, hematologital test, blood chemistry tests, urine tests, and clinical laboratory test, 12-lead EKG etc following the characteristics aboht the IP within the 3 weeks before investogator products are administrated.
- Subjects who voluntarily decide to participated in this trial after comletely understand about this clinical trial.
Exclusion criteria
- Subjects who are judged not suitable to participated in this trial.
- Other specific exlusion criteria is identified in the protocol.
